categories: Category:Members of the Sphere of Imperial Intelligence
Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ilikith was a Sith Lord of the resurgent Sith Empire during the Galactic War. He was send alongside Lord Charnoq to recovered the Black Codex from the Imperial Agent Cipher Nine on the Star Chamber in Null Zone.

If the player decides to destroy the Codex, Illikith and Charnoq attack the player. If the player sided with Darth Jadus in Act 1, Ilikith identified him as Hand of Darth Jadus. If the player spares Ardun Kothe on Quesh and later joins him on Corellia, Illikith and Charnoq are killed by the Jedi.
